column5: As there have been several detailed reports regarding Eddie Norths Beteau Lake outpost camp I have decided to spare everyone the editorial and post a photo report for those that are visual in nature. The fishing at Beteau is exceptional and this photo report depicts some of our trip to Beteau Lake June 2-9th, 2012. The report can be found at http://ontariofishingcommunity.com/f...howtopic=68829 Cheers Walleye Wanderer
Looks like a good trip. Lots of nice northerns. Hope this year is just as good.
